short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR codes and shorten URLs easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate QR codes and shorten URLs with this package. It provides a straightforward interface to create QR codes from text or URLs and to shorten long URLs using popular URL shortening services. Perfect for integrating QR code generation and URL shortening functionality into your applications with minimal effort.
